First Visit Bonus: Ascend Traits

Ascend Traits:
You can grant new assets, called
Ascended Assets, that add to a
Hero's existing assets and flaws.

Ascended Heroes:
Ascended Heroes can receive
a single Ascended Asset.

Non-Ascended Heroes:
Heroes besides Ascended Heroes
can also consume an Ascendant
Floret to use Ascend Traits once.

Arena Effects:
Increases from Ascended Assets
do not change how the Hero's
stats are treated during opponent
selection in modes like Arena.

Ascended Flaws:
Using Ascend Traits on a Hero's
flaw trait will cancel out that flaw.
(If a flaw is canceled by a merge,
the Ascended Asset will remain in
effect as normal.)

Heroes with No Flaw:
If a stat increase from a merge
would raise a stat that has already
been increased by an Ascended
Asset, the stat increase from the
merge will be applied to a
different stat instead.

Merge Allies Effects:
When merging allies, if the source
ally has an Ascended Asset that
matches the target ally's normal
asset (and the target ally does not
already have an Ascended Asset),
then the Ascended Asset will be
applied to a different stat instead.

Using Trait Fruit:
If you give a Hero a Trait Fruit
after granting them an Ascended
Asset, it is possible to change both
their asset and Ascendant Asset.
